ValidationRule.description: Close Date and Outcome must be provided for Closed Appeals
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Closed"), OR( ISBLANK(Close_Date__c), TEXT(Outcome__c) = NULL, ISBLANK(Closure_Details__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date, Outcome and Closure Details must be completed for Closed Appeals
